articles.content:
Headquarters of Women's Movement Formed in S. Korea 
   Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the South Kyongsang Provincial Women's Movement for Checking Conclusion of south Korea-U.S. FTA was inaugurated in front of the South Kyongsang Provincial Office with due ceremony on Aug. 8, according to the Internet broadcasting Voice of People of south Korea.
 Speakers at the inaugural ceremony noted that the women's vanguard for reunification is now conducting brisk activities arousing the women across south Korea to the struggle for checking the conclusion of south Korea-U.S. FTA. They called on all of them to solidarize with each other and wage a vigorous struggle for checking the conclusion of FTA.    
 A declaration read out at the ceremony said the conclusion of FTA would result in seriously deteriorating the living of the women in south Korea. The headquarters will conduct dynamic actions for checking the conclusion of FTA, it stressed.

articles.title: Russian Delegations Here
articles.content:
Congratulations to Slovak PM and FM 
   Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Robert Fico upon his election as prime minister of Slovakia.
 The message wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for the country's prosperity and the well-being of the Slovak people, expressing the belief that the cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the mutual interests.    
 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to Jan Kubis upon his appointment as foreign minister of Slovakia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Russian Delegations Here 
   Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Orthodox Church led by its Chairman of the Office for Foreign Relations Kirill, patriarch of Smolensk and Kaliningrad Regions, arrived here Saturday to participate in a ceremony for the completion of the Jongbaek Church.
 On the same day a delegation of the Russian Federal State Unitary Enterprise "Cinema Concern 'Mosfilm'" led by its First Deputy General Director Vladimir Ryassov arrived here.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela 
   Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The famous work of Kim Jong Il "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" was brought out in booklet by the Canta Claro Publishing House of Venezuela on August 1.
 The work published on May 5, Juche 80 (1991) comprehensively deals with the essential nature, advantages and invincibility of Korean-style socialism.
